text: The Commission des titres d'ingénieur (CTI) (in English engineering accreditation institution) is the French administration that deals with accreditation of Master's degree in engineering schools (engineering Grandes écoles). It was created in 1934.LA COMMISSION DES TITRES D’INGÉNIEUR (CTI) == Accredited French Engineering Schools before 1934 == Full name Acronym City Conservatoire national des arts et métiers CNAM Paris
